title: Which one is correct? She didnt know or she didnt knew. - Quora
tags: Guru Gobind Singh Khalsa Higher Secondary School

response.answer_text: “She did not know.” In English, “did” is never used with the past-tense form of the verb. “Did knew”, “did ran”, “did walked” etc. are all wrong, and most native speakers would never say them even in non-standard dialects. “Did” is a weird word, grammatically speaking.

The correct answer is she didn't know because it is a past indefinite sentence and with did we always use first form of the verb not second or third. No matter which type of sentence you use,with did first form of the verb is used.
